actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I. The next meeting is scheduled for 12:00 p.m. on November 17, 2025.

The House received a communication from Steve Scalise, Republican Leader. Pursuant to the Barry Goldwater Scholarship and Excellence in Education Foundation authorizing statute (20 U.S.C. section 4703), Mr. Scalise recommended the Honorable Burgess Owens of Utah to be appointed to the Board of Trustees.

Pursuant to section 803(a) of the Congressional Recognition for Excellence in Arts Education Act (2 U.S.C. 803 (a)), and the order of the House of January 3, 2025, the Speaker appointed the following member of the House to the Congressional Award Board: Ms. Foxx.

actions-list.header: Board of Trustees of the Open World Leadership Center
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to section 313 of the Legislative Branch Appropriations Act, 2001 (2 U.S.C. 1151), as amended by section 1601 of Pub L. 111-68, and the order of the House of January 3, 2025, the Speaker appointed the following member of the House to the Board of Trustees of the Open World Leadership Center: Mr. Bacon.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Randy Fine to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
